shape_area

Class ThreeDimension

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape_area.ThreeDimension

  • public class ThreeDimension
extends java.lang.Object
    The class contains various methods to calculate surface area of different solid figures such as cube, cuboid, sphere, cone, triangular prism, cylinder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreeDimension() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double Calc_SArea_Cone(double radius, double height)
      The method calculates surface area of a cone taking height and radius of the base as input.
      static double Calc_SArea_Cube(double side)
      The method calculates surface area of a cube taking the side as input.
      static double Calc_SArea_Cuboid(double length, double width, double height)
      The method calculates surface area of a cuboid taking length, width and height as input.
      static double Calc_SArea_Cylinder(double r, double h)
      The method calculates surface area of a cylinder taking the height and radius of base as input.
      static double Calc_SArea_Sphere(double radius)
      The method calculates surface area of a sphere taking the radius as input.
      static double Calc_SArea_Triangular_Prism(double base, double height, double width)
      The method calculates surface area of a triangular prism taking the height, width and base as input.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This main method displays a menu used for selection of calculation of surface area of desired solid figure.
      static void Redirect(java.util.Scanner inp)
      The method contains menu driven code to either continue calculation of area, surface area, volume or exit.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • Calc_SArea_Cube

        public static double Calc_SArea_Cube(double side)
        The method calculates surface area of a cube taking the side as input.
        Parameters:
        side - is used as the length of a side of cube
        Returns:
        This returns the surface area of cube with the given side

      • Calc_SArea_Cuboid

        public static double Calc_SArea_Cuboid(double length,
                                       double width,
                                       double height)
        The method calculates surface area of a cuboid taking length, width and height as input.
        Parameters:
        length - used as length of the cuboid.
        width - used as width of the cuboid.
        height - used as height of the cuboid.
        Returns:
        the calculated surface area of the cuboid.

      • Calc_SArea_Triangular_Prism

        public static double Calc_SArea_Triangular_Prism(double base,
                                                 double height,
                                                 double width)
        The method calculates surface area of a triangular prism taking the height, width and base as input.
        Parameters:
        base - is the base of the triangular prism .
        height - is the height of the triangular prism.
        width - is the width of the prism.
        Returns:
        the surface area of the prism

      • Calc_SArea_Cylinder

        public static double Calc_SArea_Cylinder(double r,
                                         double h)
        The method calculates surface area of a cylinder taking the height and radius of base as input.
        Parameters:
        r - is used as the radius of the cylinder.
        h - is used as the height of the cylinder.
        Returns:
        the surface area of the cylinder.

      • Calc_SArea_Cone

        public static double Calc_SArea_Cone(double radius,
                                     double height)
        The method calculates surface area of a cone taking height and radius of the base as input.
        Parameters:
        radius - used as the radius of the cone.
        height - used as the height of the cone.
        Returns:
        the surface area of the cone calculated given the radius and height.

      • Calc_SArea_Sphere

        public static double Calc_SArea_Sphere(double radius)
        The method calculates surface area of a sphere taking the radius as input.
        Parameters:
        radius - is the radius of the sphere.
        Returns:
        the surface area of the sphere given the radius..

      • Redirect

        public static void Redirect(java.util.Scanner inp)
        The method contains menu driven code to either continue calculation of area, surface area, volume or exit.
        Parameters:
        inp - is a Scanner object used to take the input for the side of a cube.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This main method displays a menu used for selection of calculation of surface area of desired solid figure.
        Parameters:
        args -
